properties.title: Apache James Server 3 - Batch sizes Configuration

section.name: Batch sizes configuration
section.p: Limits on operations to be done at the same time. The goal is to avoid to overwhelm the database?
This file is for now specific to Cassandra guice wiring.

subsection.name: batchsizes.properties
subsection.p: Consult batchsizes.properties in GIT to get some examples and hints.
